alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Box Elder and central Tooele Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 320 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Utah Test and Training Range South, or 32 miles southeast of Wendover, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Knolls, Clive and Utah Test and Training Range North. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 21 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
